entries.title_d: The smuggler is currently being transported to the Yavin Imperial fleet for interrogation. It is your duty to make sure that he never gets there. Your first option is to disable the prison vessel and hack it's computer to open the prisoners cells so they can take over the ship. Your second option, well hopefully it will never come to that.
entries.title: Yavin system: Rescue the smuggler.
entries.thanks_5: I owe you a big one pilot, nice job!
entries.thanks_3: Another score for the good guys!
entries.thanks_2: Not bad, not bad at all...
entries.thanks_1: Wohoo! I give this to the Alliance, they sure hire good pilots!
entries.taunt_5: You Rebels just made a huge mistake!
entries.taunt_3: Assisting convicted criminals is a crime punishable by death.
entries.taunt_1: You have 10 seconds to shut down your engines and surrender!
entries.target_disabled: Tactical Computer: < Scans show target vessel disabled. Initiating hack sequence to unlock prison cells. >
entries.shields_depleted: Well no more shields over here, this is going to get bumpy!
entries.recovery_success: The smuggler and the rest of the prisoners are safe. Great job pilot!
entries.quest_recover_d: The prison cells have been unlocked, it's now in the hands of the prisoners to take control of the shuttle. If any enemy fighters are in the area, try to take them out quickly.
entries.quest_location_d: The prison ship is travelling through a dangerous part of the Yavin system and it will only get worse the closer to the Imperial fleet he gets.
entries.quest_escort_d: Help the prisoners get to the safety of the Rebel base. Escort them and destroy any enemy presence near their ship.
entries.quest_disable_d: Take out the engines or reactor of the ship to stop it in its tracks. Your droid will then hack the onboard computer and open the prison cells. To target specific components on a star ship, input the bracket commands ( ] or [ ) to your tactical computer.
entries.panic_5: More TIE fighters, help us pilot!
entries.panic_4: I wonder if they won't shoot us, since we have some of their own onboard...
entries.panic_2: I was hoping we could slip away quietly, what was I thinking.
entries.panic_1: Imperial fools incoming! I can't help much in this ship so you better be good pilot!
entries.hull_half: We're taking massive damage! Better get them now pilot, we won't last long!
entries.failed_escape: They got away! This might be the end of this operation. Return to base immediately!
entries.failed_destroy: The prison transport is destroyed! All those lives... Return to base immediately!
entries.escort_wiped_out: Tactical Computer: < No more fighter vessels within sensor range. >
entries.escort_remaining: Tactical Computer: < Sensors still show armed fighter vessels in immediate area. >
entries.complete: Navigation course plotted. Initiating jump to lightspeed, heading for Lok. Thank you my friend!
entries.capture_started: Tactical Computer: < Hack sequence complete. All prison cells on board target vessel unlocked. >
entries.capture_phase_2: I've taken the bridge with the help of some other prisoners. I'm trying to figure out the flight controls of this baby now.
entries.capture_phase_1: We are overpowering the guards. I'm heading for the bridge!
entries.capture_complete: Tactical Computer: < Scans show target vessel self repairing and powering up. >
entries.attack_stopped: Tactical Computer: < No more fighter vessels within sensor range. >
entries.attack_notify: Tactical Computer: < Incoming fighter vessels. Scans show weapons armed. >
entries.arrival_phase_2: The Imperial prison ship has arrived. Intercept it at this location and disable it!
entries.arrival_phase_1: The Imperial prison transport should arrive any second now.
entries.angry_disable: You will not get away with this, Rebel scum!
entries.abort: I can't abort now, your leaving me to my death...
